about.content: I'm a strategic product leader with 20+ years of experience building digital systems that people rely on. I serve as an overarching product compass for multidisciplinary squads, combining deep technical intuition with a sophisticated understanding of user behavioral economics. My approach focuses on clarity, usability, and longevity—working within real-world constraints while directly influencing operational strategy for platforms that define modern culture.
